News, Events, and Things to Do at Shops at Merrick Park
Discover fun things to do at Shops at Merrick Park
From in-store demos and classes to a wide variety of entertaining events and activities, we’re always offering fun experiences for our guests. Explore our current and upcoming events, and plan your next adventure at Shops at Merrick Park.
Happening Now
There are no news or events available at this time.

Facebook page
Facebook page

Contact Us
Let us know how we can help
We’re here to ensure that you have the best shopping experience possible. Please contact us if we can help you in any way - simply call or complete the form below and we’ll get back with you as soon as possible.
Advertising
Explore our various
advertising
opportunities.
Call for information
We’re only a quick dial away. Give us a call and we’ll do our best to answer any question that you may have.
(305) 529-1215
Lease with us
Shops at Merrick Park has available spaces for lease. Join our esteemed group of retailers and take advantage of our prime location to showcase your brand to a diverse and engaged audience. Discover our featured
leasing
and
advertising
opportunities and become part of Brookfield Properties group of retailers in Coral Gables, FL.
Media inquiries
If you are a member of the media, you can contact our public relations relation team at
PRESS@BROOKFIELDPROPERTIES.COM
. A response will be provided as quickly as possible. Please understand that media information is listed for the sole purpose of providing assistance to members of the press.
How can we help?
